title: Fairmont Luxury in Sun-Kissed California
description: Nestled just an hour from San Francisco, Sonoma Country is California’s best-kept secret. Thought Napa Valley was California’s wine capital? Think again. Coastal Sonoma County is known as ‘wine country plus’, with an incredible 425 wineries together with nearly 90km of Pacific coastline for whale-watching and beautiful parks. Discover everything this spectacular destination has to offer with a stay at Fairmont Sonoma Mission Inn & Spa, the wine country’s finest resort featuring Californian farm-to-fork dining at the Michelin-rated Santé restaurant, a spectacular 3,700 sqm spa with mineral baths, complimentary hikes, yoga and fitness classes and more. Enjoy daily breakfast staying in a plush Fairmont Room or upgrade to indulge in Suite luxury with spa access.

title: Vineyard Escape with the Best of Sonoma’s Wine Country on your Doorstep
description: The perfect escape for wine lovers: spend three relaxing nights at Vintners Inn, situated across 92 sprawling acres of vineyards and lush grounds, and positioned as the gateway to Sonoma’s wine country. An ideal add-on to a road trip through California or a tranquil self-contained getaway, enjoy daily breakfast for two, a bottle of wine on arrival, a nightly glass of wine each, a VIP tour and tasting at Ferrari-Carano vineyards and a US$50 dining credit to use across the hotel’s restaurants.
offer_address: 4350 Barnes Rd, Santa Rosa, CA 95403, USA
